member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionService
member.summary: Defines the SuggestionService class which provides suggestion services such as auto-complete.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Adds a multi-character to the buffer.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionService.ClearMultiCharacterBuffer
member.summary: Clears the multi character buffer.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionService.ProvideMultiCharacterSuggestions
member.summary: Provides suggestions according to the multi-key buffer.
member.returns: Returns an collection with disambiguation suggestions first and then auto-complete suggestions.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionService.ProvideSuggestions
member.summary: Gets the suggestions based on the current text.
member.returns: Returns an of strings containing the suggestions.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionService.RemoveLastMultiCharacter
member.summary: Removes the last multi-character from the buffer.

member.name: P:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionService.WriteSuggestionCommand
member.summary: Gets or sets the command for adding a suggestion.

member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionsProviderModule
member.summary: Class for initializing the module for providing suggestions based on the context (current text, current multi-text, etc.) given certain algorithms or services known as sources.

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionsProviderModule.#ctor(Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The unity DI container (obtained through DI).

member.name: M:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionsProviderModule.Initialize
member.summary: Registers a unique instance of the suggestion service in the dependency injection container.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Adds a multi-character to the buffer.

member.summary: Clears the multi character buffer.

member.summary: Filters and returns suggestions according to the multi-key buffer.
member.param: Nothing is required. May be used later on.
member.returns: Returns an with disambiguation suggestions first and then auto-complete suggestions.

member.name: T:TalkingKeyboard.Modules.SuggestionsProvider.SuggestionSources.PresageSuggestionSource
member.summary: This class provides auto-completion suggestions obtained from an external application called Presage which uses an n-gram database to perform text prediction.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the suggestions.
member.param: String (as object) with the text on which the suggestions are based (i.e. the currently displayed text).
member.returns: Returns an of strings containing the suggestions.
